title: Texas Firm Recalls Ground Beef Due To Possible E. Coli O157:H7 Contamination
summary: Editor's Note: The recalled product, which bears "LOT: 065" on the lower right side of the label, was shipped to locations in Georgia only. No other lot numbers are affected by this recall. WASHINGTON, Sep 23, 2011 - Palo Duro Meat, an Amarillo, Texas, establishment...
impacted_products: 40-lb boxes containing four 10-lb chubs of fine ground beef.
